  • Uses of StorageDBBuilder in com.storage.engine

    Methods in com.storage.engine that return StorageDBBuilder
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    StorageDBBuilder
    StorageDBBuilder.withAutoCompactDisabled()
    Disables automatic compaction in the StorageDB instance.
    StorageDBBuilder
    StorageDBBuilder.withBufferFlushTimeoutMs(long bufferFlushTimeoutMs)
    Sets the buffer flush timeout in milliseconds for the StorageDB instance.
    StorageDBBuilder
    StorageDBBuilder.withCompactionWaitTimeoutMs(long compactionWaitTimeoutMs)
    Sets the compaction wait timeout in milliseconds for the StorageDB instance.
    StorageDBBuilder
    StorageDBBuilder.withDataToWalFileRatio(int dataToWalFileRatio)
    Sets the data to WAL (Write-Ahead Log) file ratio in the StorageDB instance.
    StorageDBBuilder
    StorageDBBuilder.withDbDir(String dbDir)
    Sets the directory path for the StorageDB instance.
    StorageDBBuilder
    StorageDBBuilder.withDbDir(Path path)
    Sets the directory path for the StorageDB instance using a Path object.
    StorageDBBuilder
    StorageDBBuilder.withIndexMap(IndexMap indexMap)
    Sets the index map for the StorageDB instance.
    StorageDBBuilder
    StorageDBBuilder.withMaxBufferSize(int maxBufferSize)
    Sets the maximum buffer size for the StorageDB instance.
    StorageDBBuilder
    StorageDBBuilder.withMaxOpenFDCount(int openFDCount)
    Sets the maximum count of open file descriptors for the StorageDB instance.
    StorageDBBuilder
    StorageDBBuilder.withMinBuffersToCompact(int minBuffersToCompact)
    Sets the minimum number of buffers to compact in the StorageDB instance.
    StorageDBBuilder
    StorageDBBuilder.withValueSize(int valueSize)
    Sets the value size for the StorageDB instance.
